original_text: And the Lord sold them into the hand of Jabin king of Canaan, that reigned in Hazor; the captain of whose host was Sisera, which dwelt in Harosheth of the Gentiles.
korean_text: 여호와께서 하솔에서 통치하는 가나안 왕 야빈의 손에 그들을 팔았으니 그의 군대 장관은 하로셋 학고임에 거주하는 시스라요

sentences.original_text: And the Lord sold them into the hand of Jabin
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 주께서 그들을 야빈의 손에 팔아 넘기셨으니

sentences.original_text: the captain of whose host was Sisera
which dwelt in Harosheth of the Gentiles
